member.summary: Releases all resource used by the object.
member.remarks: Call when you are finished using the . The method leaves the in an unusable state. After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying.

member.summary: Runs diagnostics on the specified file.
member.param: The plugin to test.

member.name: M:CyrusBuilt.MonoPluginFramework.Diagnostics.TestMachine.Run
member.summary: Run this instance. This performs all the tests. A plugin is considered valid if all of the following conditions are true: - File exists. - File is a Mono/.NET assembly. - File is not an assembly that has already been loaded. - Assembly contains a public type that implements IPlugin.

member.summary: Handles the reflection only resolve event.
member.returns: The assembly resolved from the strong path.
member.param: The object sending the event call.
The event arguments.
